titles.title: Small Business Child Care Investment Act
Small Business Child Care Investment Act
Small Business Child Care Investment Act
A bill to allow nonprofit child care providers to participate in certain loan programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Ernst with an amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 9.

committee.name: Senate Small Business and Entrepreneurship
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
